com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Interface DbPersistence.DbCleanUpPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistence.CleanUpPolicy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DbPersistence.LastUpdateDbCleanUpPolicy
    Enclosing class:
    DbPersistence

    public static interface DbPersistence.DbCleanUpPolicy
extends Persistence.CleanUpPolicy
    The basis interface for all DbPersistence instances.

    The implementing class must have a public constructor, which takes a single int as argument, which is the persistence instance index.

    Since:
    2012.03.13
